Description.div: This is the DeliveryMethod of the shipment to which OldestExpShpDate belongs. It is used to get the threshold to calculate SLA of the batch.
This flag indicates if BOPUS and SFS orders are combined in the batch.
This is the oldest ExpectedShipmentDate of the shipments in the batch. It is used to calculate SLA.
Number of batch lines in the output.
A batch line is for combined shipment lines which have same ItemID and UnitOfMeasure This is not template controlled. All the attributes will be there in the output.
This attribute is Y if the batch line is completely picked.
Total picked quantity in the batch line. This is the sum of BackroomPickedQuantity of shipment lines that make up a batch line.
Department to which this item belongs.
This is comma separated HoldLocation for all the shipments that belong to the batch line.
Item ID of the batch line.
Total quantity to be picked in the batch line. This is the sum of OriginalQuantity of shipment lines that make up a batch line.
Total picked quantity in the batch line for shipments with DeliveryMethod=PICK
Comma separated values of Pick Location of the batch line in a store sales floor or backroom.

Pick Location Sequence of the pick location for the line. Used in store application for suggesting picks to user in a sequential manner. If noOrderBy element is passed in the input, BatchLines are sorted by this attribute.
Total quantity in the batch line for shipments with DeliveryMethod=PICK
Total staged quantity in the batch line for shipments with DeliveryMethod=PICK
This is the sum of Quantity of shipment lines that make up a batch line.
Total picked quantity in the batch line for shipments with DeliveryMethod=SHP
Total quantity in the batch line for shipments with DeliveryMethod=SHP
Total staged quantity in the batch line for shipments with DeliveryMethod=SHP
This quantity that is shorted for this batch line. This is the sum of ShortageQty of shipment lines that make up a batch line.
Total staged quantity in the batch line. This is the sum of StagedQuantity of shipment lines that make up a batch line.
This attribute is Y if the batch line is completely staged.
Unit of measure of the batch line.
If ItemDetails element is passed inside ShipmentLine also, then the merged ItemDetails template will be used.

Attribute.Name: IsItemSuperseded
Attribute.Description:
This flag indicates if this item has been superseded.
Valid Values: Y , N

Attribute.Name: DisplayItemDescription
Attribute.Description: User defined description of the item.

Attribute.Name: IsValid
Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the item is valid.

Attribute.Name: UnitVolume
Attribute.Description: Calculated volume of one unit of item quantity.

Attribute.Name: UnitVolumeUOM
Attribute.Description: Unit of measure in which the item volume is measured.

Description.div: This element lists all the StoreBatchLocation (i.e. Totes) for the batch line.
This element lists all the ShipmentLines that are put into this batch location.

Attribute.Name: ActualQuantity
Attribute.Description: Actual quantity of the shipment line shipped.

Attribute.Name: DocumentType
Attribute.Description: The document type of the orders comprising the shipment.

Attribute.Name: HasWorkOrders
Attribute.Description: Indicates if any non-service workorders exist for a shipment line

Attribute.Name: OrderAvailableOnSystem
Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the order is available on the system or not.

Attribute.Name: PlacedQuantity
Attribute.Description: The sum of all placed quantity in the container details for the shipment line.

Attribute.Name: ReceivedQuantity
Attribute.Description: Quantity received for the shipment line.

Attribute.Name: isHistory
Attribute.Description: Indicates if data is fetched from the regular table or the history table. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Indicates total number of records fetched.

Attribute.Name: isHistory
Attribute.Description: Indicates if data is fetched from the regular table or the history table. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Attribute.Name: CaseId
Attribute.Description: A CaseId.

Attribute.Name: PalletId
Attribute.Description: A PalletId.

Attribute.Name: ShipmentSubLineNo
Attribute.Description: Part of Unique Key of ShipmentLine entity.

Description.div: Stores additional information related to tag number, serial number, ship by date for a shipment line or container detail. Tag information is stored only if the Node tracks tag information in inventory or the Buyer mandates tag information.

Attribute.Name: isHistory
Attribute.Description: Indicates if data is fetched from the regular table or the history table. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Description.div: This field indicates the total number of pickable units in a shipment. This attribute will be returned in the output only if passed in the template. Only pickable line quantities are counted for this attribute; parent lines and bundle parent lines are ignored.

Attribute.Name: isHistory
Attribute.Description: Indicates if data is fetched from the regular table or the history table. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Description.div:
Only applicable for published data of Delete Order event, which can be raised by the deleteOrder API. Action =
DELETE
will be published to indicate that the order line will be deleted.

Attribute.Name: AllocationDate
Attribute.Description: The date when this line will be allocated. This is calculated at order creation time, based on the node processing time. This field is not used from version 50 onwards. The ALLOCATION_LEAD_TIME field is used instead.

Attribute.Name: AllocationLeadTime
Attribute.Description: The number of days it will take any node to ship the item after a ship advice is sent. It is defaulted from the Rule Set Field Name (YFS_RULES.LEAD_TIME). The release process will this value, or the scheduled node's lead time (setup at ship node level), whichever is greater.

Attribute.Name: ApptWarning
Attribute.Description: Displays a warning message if CannotScheduleBeforeDate or CannotScheduleAfterDate fields have a Non-Null value.

Attribute.Name: AvailableQtyForStopDelivery
Attribute.Description: The quantity available through modification rules for making a stop delivery request for this line.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingDeliveryRequest
Attribute.Description: A flag to indicate if the order line is awaiting for a Delivery service association.

Description.div:
Indicates if this order has chained or related lines.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Attribute.Name: HasDeliveryLines
Attribute.Description: Indicates if the line has associated delivery lines. Valid only for product lines.

Description.div:
Indicates if order line has lines derived from it.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Attribute.Name: HasServiceLines
Attribute.Description: Indicates if the line has associated service lines. Valid only for product lines.

Attribute.Name: IntentionalBackorder
Attribute.Description: A flag to indicate if the order line should be backordered upon creation. If passed as 'Y', the line will be backordered even if inventory is available. This flag is ignored if reservation is mandatory.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedQty
Attribute.Description: Deprecated as Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite 9.2.1. Invoiced quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedQuantity
Attribute.Description: Invoiced quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: IsBundleParent
Attribute.Description:
Indicates if Order line is bundle parent line or not.
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Attribute.Name: MaxLineStatus
Attribute.Description: Maximum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MaxLineStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of maximum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinLineStatus
Attribute.Description: Minimum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinLineStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of minimum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MultipleStatusesExist
Attribute.Description: If order line is in more than one status then this flag will be returned as "Y".

Attribute.Name: OpenQty
Attribute.Description: Total quantity that can be cancelled from the line.

Attribute.Name: OverallStatus
Attribute.Description: A description of the order line's overall status determined by the YFSGetOverallStatusUE.

Attribute.Name: RemainingQty
Attribute.Description: Remaining quantity.

Attribute.Name: ReturnReasonLongDesc
Attribute.Description: Long description of the return reason code.

Attribute.Name: ReturnReasonShortDesc
Attribute.Description: Short description of the return reason code.

Attribute.Name: ReturnableQty
Attribute.Description: Quantity of item that could be returned from this line at its current status.

Attribute.Name: ScacAndService
Attribute.Description: Value of SCAC and Service code.

Attribute.Name: ScacAndServiceKey
Attribute.Description: Link to YFS_SCAC_AND_SERVICE table.

Attribute.Name: Status
Attribute.Description: Status description of the order line.

Attribute.Name: StatusQuantity
Attribute.Description: Quantity on the order line in the current status.

Attribute.Name: SubstituteItemID
Attribute.Description: Substituted ItemID. This field is only populated if the item on the Order line is substituted. This field is deprecated, see OverrideItemID on the OrderStatus/Details element.

Attribute.Name: SubstituteItemUOM
Attribute.Description: Substituted Item UOM. This field is only populated if the item on the Order line is substituted. This field is deprecated, see OverrideItemID on the OrderStatus/Details element.

Description.div:
Indicates if data is fetched from the history table rather than the regular table.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Attribute.Name: IsItemSuperseded
Attribute.Description:
This flag indicates if this item has been superseded.
Valid Values: Y , N

Attribute.Name: DisplayItemDescription
Attribute.Description: User defined description of the item.

Attribute.Name: IsValid
Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the item is valid.

Attribute.Name: UnitVolume
Attribute.Description: Calculated volume of one unit of item quantity.

Attribute.Name: UnitVolumeUOM
Attribute.Description: Unit of measure in which the item volume is measured.

Element.Description: Contains computed information about the price and total amount details for the order line. If the line is a bundle parent, components with IsLinePriceForInformationOnly flag set to Y are ignored in the total calculation. If the bundle parent is a recommended line, then the total will be based on the BundlePricingStrategy defined for the item.

Attribute.Name: AdditionalLinePriceTotal
Attribute.Description: Total Price for all non-informational Additional Line Prices for the Component Lines of a Bundle Parent. List Price times ActualPricingQuantity.

Description.div: The computed amount of the charges for this line.
The computed total of the discount amounts.

Attribute.Name: ExtendedPrice
Attribute.Description: The computed price for this line before taxes, charges, and discounts are accounted for.

Attribute.Name: LineCost
Attribute.Description: The total cost incurred on this order line. If this order line is part of a bundle, LineCost is evaluated based on the bundle's' pricing strategy.

Attribute.Name: LineTotal
Attribute.Description: The total amount for this line.

Attribute.Name: LineTotalWithoutTax
Attribute.Description: The computed total amount for this line before taxes are accounted for.

Attribute.Name: PercentProfitMargin
Attribute.Description: The percentage of the profit margin for this line. Depending on the pricing strategy, all components or part of the components are considered for the profit margin calculation. OrderLine Option OptionPrices and OrderLine AdditionalLinePriceTotals are not considered for the Profit Margin.

Attribute.Name: Tax
Attribute.Description: The computed amount of taxes for this line.

Attribute.Name: UnitPrice
Attribute.Description: The price for one unit of this line.

Element.Description: Specifies the unique identifiers of the bundle parent order line for this order line.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Indicates total number of records fetched.

Attribute.Name: isHistory
Attribute.Description: Indicates if data is fetched from the regular table or the history table. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Description.div: This element lists all the ShipmentLines which are combined for the batch line.

Attribute.Name: ActualQuantity
Attribute.Description: Actual quantity of the shipment line shipped.

Attribute.Name: DocumentType
Attribute.Description: The document type of the orders comprising the shipment.

Attribute.Name: HasWorkOrders
Attribute.Description: Indicates if any non-service workorders exist for a shipment line

Attribute.Name: OrderAvailableOnSystem
Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the order is available on the system or not.

Attribute.Name: PlacedQuantity
Attribute.Description: The sum of all placed quantity in the container details for the shipment line.

Attribute.Name: ReceivedQuantity
Attribute.Description: Quantity received for the shipment line.

Attribute.Name: isHistory
Attribute.Description: Indicates if data is fetched from the regular table or the history table. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Indicates total number of records fetched.

Attribute.Name: isHistory
Attribute.Description: Indicates if data is fetched from the regular table or the history table. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Attribute.Name: CaseId
Attribute.Description: A CaseId.

Attribute.Name: PalletId
Attribute.Description: A PalletId.

Attribute.Name: ShipmentSubLineNo
Attribute.Description: Part of Unique Key of ShipmentLine entity.

Description.div: Stores additional information related to tag number, serial number, ship by date for a shipment line or container detail. Tag information is stored only if the Node tracks tag information in inventory or the Buyer mandates tag information.

Attribute.Name: isHistory
Attribute.Description: Indicates if data is fetched from the regular table or the history table. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Attribute.Name: isHistory
Attribute.Description: Indicates if data is fetched from the regular table or the history table. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Description.div:
Only applicable for published data of Delete Order event, which can be raised by the deleteOrder API. Action =
DELETE
will be published to indicate that the order line will be deleted.

Attribute.Name: AllocationDate
Attribute.Description: The date when this line will be allocated. This is calculated at order creation time, based on the node processing time. This field is not used from version 50 onwards. The ALLOCATION_LEAD_TIME field is used instead.

Attribute.Name: AllocationLeadTime
Attribute.Description: The number of days it will take any node to ship the item after a ship advice is sent. It is defaulted from the Rule Set Field Name (YFS_RULES.LEAD_TIME). The release process will this value, or the scheduled node's lead time (setup at ship node level), whichever is greater.

Attribute.Name: ApptWarning
Attribute.Description: Displays a warning message if CannotScheduleBeforeDate or CannotScheduleAfterDate fields have a Non-Null value.

Attribute.Name: AvailableQtyForStopDelivery
Attribute.Description: The quantity available through modification rules for making a stop delivery request for this line.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingDeliveryRequest
Attribute.Description: A flag to indicate if the order line is awaiting for a Delivery service association.

Indicates if this order has chained or related lines.

N

or

Attribute.Name: IntentionalBackorder
Attribute.Description: A flag to indicate if the order line should be backordered upon creation. If passed as 'Y', the line will be backordered even if inventory is available. This flag is ignored if reservation is mandatory.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedQty
Attribute.Description: Deprecated as Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite 9.2.1. Invoiced quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedQuantity
Attribute.Description: Invoiced quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: IsBundleParent
Attribute.Description:
Indicates if Order line is bundle parent line or not.
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Attribute.Name: MaxLineStatus
Attribute.Description: Maximum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MaxLineStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of maximum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinLineStatus
Attribute.Description: Minimum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Description: Description of minimum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MultipleStatusesExist
Attribute.Description: If order line is in more than one status then this flag will be returned as "Y".

Attribute.Name: OpenQty

Attribute.Name: Status
Attribute.Description: Status description of the order line.

Attribute.Name: StatusQuantity
Attribute.Description: Quantity on the order line in the current status.

Attribute.Name: SubstituteItemID
Attribute.Description: Substituted ItemID. This field is only populated if the item on the Order line is substituted. This field is deprecated, see OverrideItemID on the OrderStatus/Details element.

Attribute.Name: SubstituteItemUOM
Attribute.Description: Substituted Item UOM. This field is only populated if the item on the Order line is substituted. This field is deprecated, see OverrideItemID on the OrderStatus/Details element.
